body_html: @asimshankar Thank you for providing the link; however, I am still not clear about how to modify my model_fn to use larger batch size by fully utilizing two GPU memories. Is there any existing examples of codes? I mean the real model_fn examples rather than just assigning a few variables example. Thank you so much for your help.
